comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: Visit of the British Minister Attlee at Walcheren.  The visit is by DUKW (amphibian vehicle)

comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content:
Attlee was vice-minister-president tijdens zijn bezoek. Pas op 27 juli 1945 werd hij premier
Attlee was vice-prime minister at the moment of his visit. Only at the 27th of july 1945 he became prime-minister.
